casebody.data:
CITIMORTGAGE, INC.
v.
Raymond Winston MCLAUGHLIN et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 8, 2016.

Raymond Winston McLaughlin, self-represented, and Nicole J. McLaughlin, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Peter E. Ventre, Hartford, in opposition.

The defendants' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 38854) is denied.
